title: Plate, "Portrait of Lenin", 1980
markings: Marks: On underside: Lomonosov "LFZ" mark hand-painted in black overglaze; (in Russian) "Portrait of V. I. Lenin / [after] Ivanova O. V. / March 1980"hand-painted in black overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular; with finely painted portrait of Lenin in center; around the border, between gilded bands, leaves, and star, the inscription "1870/1980/110"

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Portrait of Lenin", 1980.
1980. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-53.
